name: m3u8-hls-player-with-custom-keyboard-shortcuts
displayName: M3U8-HLS Player with Custom Keyboard Shortcuts

scripts.build: npm run download-deps && npm run minify
scripts.release:minify: npm run build && npm run zip
scripts.release:obfuscate: npm run obsfuscate && npm run zip
scripts.minify: npx terser npm/player.js npm/shortcuts.js -c sequences=true,dead_code=true,conditionals=true,booleans=true,unused=true,if_return=true,join_vars=true,drop_console=true -m toplevel=true -o js/player.min.js
